data.text:
ARNOLD PALMER AWARD presented by CALLAWAY GOLF

The Palmer Award is presented annually to the medallist at the NCAA Championships in Divisions I, II and III and NAIA.

Arnold Palmer Award Year Name School 1992 Phil Mickelson Arizona State- Division I Diego Ventureira Columbus- Division II John Lunduist Gustavus Adolphus- Division III 1993 Todd Dempsey Arizona State- Division I Jeev Singh Abilene Christian- Division II Ryan Jenkins Methodist College- Division III 1994 Justin Leonard University of Texas- Division I Briny Baird Valdosta State- Division II Scott Scovil Christopher Newport- Division III 1995 Chip Spratlin Auburn University- Division I Briny Baird Valdosta State- Division II Ryan Jenkins Methodist College- Division III 1996 Eldrick "Tiger" Woods Stanford- Division I Dax Johnston Centeral Oklahoma- Division II Mike Adamson Methodist College- Division III 1997 Charles Warren Clemson- Division I Scott Householder California State- San Bernardino- Division II Brion McLaughlin Methodist College- Division III 1998 James McLean University of Minnesota- Division I Orjan Larsen West Florida- Division II Chad Collins Methodist College- Division III 1999 Luke Donald Northwestern University- Division I Matt Saglio Florida Southern- Division II Chad Collins Methodist College- Division III 2000 Charles Howell Oklahoma State University- Division I Jeff Klauk Florida Southern- Division II Kevin O'Connell Greensboro- Division III 2001 Nick Gilliam University of Florida- Division I Steve Sokol Florida Southern- Division II Chad Collins
